item.title: build.sbt and build.Scala
item.description: Building Scala code # SBT, along with Maven, is a default way to build Scala applications. build.sbt is the file that defines how your project is built, but sometimes you’ll also see build.scala files in specific projects. build.scala is the more advanced version of the build.sbt file, and often is used for more complicated projects. Here’s an example of the difference between .sbt and .scala build files: build.sbt name := "hello" version := "1.
